meta.title: Cookies Policy | Pull-Up Club
meta.description: Learn about how Pull-Up Club uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us recognize your device and remember certain information about your preferences or actions.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website functionality. These cookies are necessary for the website to work properly and cannot be disabled.

authentication.title: Authentication Cookies
authentication.description: Remember your login status and keep you signed in during your session.

preference.title: Preference Cookies
preference.description: Store your settings and preferences for future visits.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site, which pages are most popular, and identify any issues.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Track the effectiveness of our marketing efforts and provide you with more relevant content.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.description: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:

options.notify: Be notified when receiving new cookies

managing.note: Please note that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience on our website and limit access to certain features.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: We use services from third parties that may place cookies on your device. These include:

analytics.title: Google Analytics
analytics.description: Used to analyze website traffic and user behavior. These cookies collect information about how you use our website.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.description: Our payment processor uses cookies to enable secure transactions and prevent fraud.

social.title: Social Media
social.description: If you use social sharing buttons, the respective social media platforms may set cookies to track this activity.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
